channel.title: Comments on: The sound design is so good even literally blind people can play
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: IKEA-SalesRep
item.dc:creator: IKEA-SalesRep
item.description: The foot steps without ninja are incredibly loud in this game, I’d say louder than MW. Although, everyone runs ninja usually.
item.content:encoded: The foot steps without ninja are incredibly loud in this game, I’d say louder than MW. Although, everyone runs ninja usually.

item.title: By: ldrinkyourmilkshake
item.dc:creator: ldrinkyourmilkshake
item.description: This is really interesting. Are you testing it to give an example of how a blind person might play or are you actually fully/partially blind?
item.content:encoded: This is really interesting. Are you testing it to give an example of how a blind person might play or are you actually fully/partially blind?

item.title: By: jjamesdias007
item.dc:creator: jjamesdias007
item.description: This is rather interesting. Would have never thought you guys would indulge in gaming but I'm glad that everyone can enjoy after all.
item.content:encoded: This is rather interesting. Would have never thought you guys would indulge in gaming but I’m glad that everyone can enjoy after all.

item.title: By: Galactical-Edge
item.dc:creator: Galactical-Edge
item.description: I'm glad that you don't let your blindness stop you! Keep up the good work!
item.content:encoded: I’m glad that you don’t let your blindness stop you! Keep up the good work!

item.title: By: chow_369
item.dc:creator: chow_369
item.description: I’m curious, how do you think Cold War compares to Modern Warfare in this case? I felt like CW sounded fairly flat and uninteresting compared to the MW, but I wasn’t relying on it in the same way you are so the differences in detail may not be as apparent to me.
item.content:encoded: I’m curious, how do you think Cold War compares to Modern Warfare in this case? I felt like CW sounded fairly flat and uninteresting compared to the MW, but I wasn’t relying on it in the same way you are so the differences in detail may not be as apparent to me.

item.title: By: Not_as_witty_as_u
item.dc:creator: Not_as_witty_as_u
item.description: Cool vid man, I was asking you about it a couple of weeks ago and was so confused but now I get it!
item.content:encoded: Cool vid man, I was asking you about it a couple of weeks ago and was so confused but now I get it!

item.title: By: example6428
item.dc:creator: example6428
item.description: I can't even hear foot steps in this game. Aldo I can only hear my own bullets or the ones that hit me. Any tupelo for sound settings?
item.content:encoded: I can’t even hear foot steps in this game. Aldo I can only hear my own bullets or the ones that hit me. Any tupelo for sound settings?

item.title: By: kiervntvylor
item.dc:creator: kiervntvylor
item.description: love it
